data.command:
notify-send "Drawing Notification" -u critical "hold shift to draw freehand
hold shift + ctrl to draw arrows
press meta + z to undo last action
mouse mark: $(qdbus org.kde.KWin /Effects  org.kde.kwin.Effects.isEffectLoaded 'mousemark')"
notify-send "Drawing Notification" -u normal "Mouse Mark aka Drawing is $(qdbus org.kde.KWin /Effects  org.kde.kwin.Effects.isEffectLoaded 'mousemark')"

qdbus org.kde.KWin /Effects org.kde.kwin.Effects.toggleEffect "mousemark"; notify-send "Drawing Notification" -u normal "Mouse Mark: $(qdbus org.kde.KWin /Effects  org.kde.kwin.Effects.isEffectLoaded 'mousemark')"

bash -c 'qdbus org.kde.KWin /Effects org.kde.kwin.Effects.isEffectLoaded kwin6_effect_grayscale | grep -q true && qdbus org.kde.KWin /Effects org.kde.kwin.Effects.unloadEffect kwin6_effect_grayscale || qdbus org.kde.KWin /Effects org.kde.kwin.Effects.loadEffect kwin6_effect_grayscale'
qdbus org.kde.kglobalaccel /component/KDE_Keyboard_Layout_Switcher org.kde.kglobalaccel.Component.invokeShortcut "Switch keyboard layout to English (UK)"
qdbus org.kde.kglobalaccel /component/KDE_Keyboard_Layout_Switcher org.kde.kglobalaccel.Component.invokeShortcut "Switch to Next Keyboard Layout"
qdbus org.kde.kglobalaccel /component/KDE_Keyboard_Layout_Switcher org.kde.kglobalaccel.Component.invokeShortcut "Switch keyboard layout to Russian"
